Title: Requires the disclosure of tariff cost estimates in automobile sales
Summary: Requires the disclosure of tariff cost estimates in automobile sales by affixing such to the car window in a clear, conspicuous, and easily understandable manner; provides such requirement can be satisfied by including it on the Monroney label.
LawCode: Amd ยง471, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to disclosing tariff cost estimates on automobile sales
